nciThesaurus.definition: A radioimmunotherapeutic humanized murine monoclonal antibody (LL2) directed against the CD22 pan-B-cell antigen and chelated to the radioisotope yttrium-90 (Y 90). Y 90 humanized monoclonal antibody LL2 binds to tumor cells expressing CD22, delivering a cytotoxic dose of beta radiation.
synonyms: Yttrium Y 90 Humanized Monoclonal Antibody LL2
